KioskWorker.name: Sprzedawca
KioskWorker.description: Sprzedaje produkty w sklepach i stoiskach.

Chef.name: Kucharz
Chef.description: Przygotowuje jedzenie w kuchni i dostarcza do miejsc gdzie jest sprzedawane.

CFO.name: CFO
CFO.description: Szef Finansów - Pozwala na zbadanie ulepszeń związanych z finansami, takich jak pożyczki czy rozbudowane raporty finansowe.

COO.name: COO
COO.description: Szef Operacji - Pozwala na zbadanie ulepszeń operacyjnych oraz logistycznych.

CTO.name: CTO
CTO.description: Szef Technologii - Pozwala na zbadanie ulepszeń związanych z technologią i zapewnia dostęp do obiektów takich jak system komunikacji publicznej i innych.

FinanceVP.name: Finance VP
FinanceVP.description: Wiceprezes ds. Finansów - Pozwala na zbadanie ulepszeń związanych z podatkami.

FoodWorker.name: Kelner
FoodWorker.description: Zbiera i przygotowuje zamówienia w kawiarniach i restauracjach.

Foreman.name: Kierownik
Foreman.description: Kierownik Budowy - Pozwala na zbadanie ulepszeń związanych z konstrukcją, takich jak przecinające się pasy startowe i innych.

RampAgent.name: RampAgent
RampAgent.description: Aircraft STUCK? Ramp agent to the rescue! They help "un-stick" all the aircraft on the ground for a small one-time fee. When their work is done, they'll leave. Also known as the "Golden Towbar Award".

Security.name: Ochroniarz
Security.description: Sprawdza bagaże i pasażerów poruszających się po lotnisku.

Workman.name: Robotnik
Workman.description: Zajmuje się wszystkimi zadaniami związanymi z konstrukcją, przenosi niepotrzebne pudełka na magazyn oraz naprawia obiekty na lotnisku. Mogą także dostarczać bagaże jeśli nie masz systemu bagażowego.

RunwayILS.name: ILS
RunwayILS.description: Instrumentalny System Lądowania pozwala samolotom przeprowadzić precyzyjne podejścia z wykorzystaniem instrumentów. Limit dopuszczalnego wiatru bocznego zostanie zmieniony z 12 do 20 węzłów. To oznacza mniej opóźnień związanych z pogodą oraz mniejsze ryzyko incydentów związanych z pogodą. Dodatkowo pomaga zainteresować duże linie lotnicze.

RunwayLights.name: Oświetlenie Pasa Startowego
RunwayLights.description: Światła na pasie startowym pozwalają lotnisku działać w nocy.

RunwayPAPI.name: Światła PAPI
RunwayPAPI.description: Wizualny indykator kąta podejścia dla pilota, zwiększa bezpieczeństwo i pozwala lądować przy wietrze bocznym do 15 węzłów (zamiast 12).

FuelPort.name: Złącze Paliwowe
FuelPort.description: Złącze, które może być umieszczone na bramce i połączone do podziemnych rur, pozwala na szybsze tankowanie samolotów.

BoosterPanel.name: Ulepszenie Przenośnika
BoosterPanel.description: Pozwala przyśpieszyć sortowanie w Koncentratorach Bagaży, dzięki temu mogą obsłużyć więcej bagaży na minutę. Limit: 2 na koncentrator.

AircraftGateSmall.name: Bramka (S)
AircraftGateSmall.description: Pozwala na załadowanie i rozładowanie samolotu.

AircraftGate.name: Bramka (L)
AircraftGate.description: Pozwala na załadowanie i rozładowanie samolotu.

AircraftGateLarge.name: Bramka (XL)
AircraftGateLarge.description: Pozwala na załadowanie i rozładowanie samolotu.

ApparelStand.name: Stoisko Ubraniowe
ApparelStand.description: Helps keep passengers entertained while earning you $5 per transaction in the process.

ATCTower.name: ATC Tower
ATCTower.description: Allows scheduling of more than 10 flights per day.

ATM.name: ATM
ATM.description: Makes passengers happy while earning you $5 per transaction.

BagScanner.name: Bag Scanner
BagScanner.description: This X-Ray machine is used by your Security staff to scan passenger carry-ons for contraband and other security threats.

BaggageCarousel.name: Baggage Carousel
BaggageCarousel.description: Connects to underground conveyor system for an automated baggage solution.

Bar-Large.name: Bar - Large
Bar-Large.description: Thirsty passengers buy drinks here. Requires a scheduled retail worker.

Bar-Small.name: Bar - Small
Bar-Small.description: Thirsty passengers buy drinks here. Requires a scheduled retail worker.

Bench.name: Bench
Bench.description: Makes passengers happy by giving them a place to idle comfortably.

BenchB.name: Bench B
BenchB.description: Makes passengers happy by giving them a place to idle comfortably.

BenchB-2Seat.name: Bench B - 2 Seat
BenchB-2Seat.description: Makes passengers happy by giving them a place to idle comfortably.

BenchB-3Seat.name: Bench B - 3 Seat
BenchB-3Seat.description: Makes passengers happy by giving them a place to idle comfortably.

BenchC.name: Bench C
BenchC.description: Makes passengers happy by giving them a place to idle comfortably.

BenchC-2Seat.name: Bench C - 2 Seat
BenchC-2Seat.description: Makes passengers happy by giving them a place to idle comfortably.

BenchC-3Seat.name: Bench C - 3 Seat
BenchC-3Seat.description: Makes passengers happy by giving them a place to idle comfortably.

BodyScanner.name: Body Scanner
BodyScanner.description: A more advanced alternative to a standard Metal Detector.

CafeChair.name: Cafe Chair
CafeChair.description: Gives passengers a place to sit & eat.

CafeChairB.name: Cafe Chair B
CafeChairB.description: Gives passengers a place to sit & eat.

CafeTable.name: Cafe Table
CafeTable.description: Gives passengers a place to sit & eat.

CafeTableB.name: Cafe Table B
CafeTableB.description: Gives passengers a place to sit & eat.

CashRegister.name: Cash Register
CashRegister.description: Customers can pay for goods picked up in cafes and stores.

FoodWarmer.name: Hot Food Display
FoodWarmer.description: Build in Cafes to show off your fresh food cooked by the kitchens! Passengers pick these up and take them to a cash register.

FoodCooler.name: Chilled Food Display
FoodCooler.description: Build in Cafes to show off your fresh food cooked by the kitchens! Passengers pick these up and take them to a cash register.

ChairB.name: Chair B
ChairB.description: Gives passengers a place to sit & eat.

CoffeeKiosk.name: Coffee Kiosk
CoffeeKiosk.description: Thirsty passengers buy drinks here. Requires a scheduled retail worker.

CoffeeMaker.name: Coffee Maker
CoffeeMaker.description: Build in a cafe for passengers to use and reduce their thirst needs. They will pay at the cafe cash register.

Cooker.name: Cooker
Cooker.description: Used to prepare Sushi, Avocado On Toast, and Donuts.

DecorativeBush1.name: Decorative Bush 1
DecorativeBush1.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

DecorativeBush2.name: Decorative Bush 2
DecorativeBush2.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

DecorativeBush3.name: Decorative Bush 3
DecorativeBush3.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

DecorativeBush4.name: Decorative Bush 4
DecorativeBush4.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

DecorativeBush5.name: Decorative Bush 5
DecorativeBush5.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

DecorativeBush6.name: Decorative Bush 6
DecorativeBush6.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

DecorativeBush7.name: Decorative Bush 7
DecorativeBush7.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

DecorativeBush8.name: Decorative Bush 8
DecorativeBush8.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

DecorativePalmTree.name: Decorative Palm Tree
DecorativePalmTree.description: A very classy decoration that will definitely give your airport that WOW factor. The higher class passengers may especially appreciate the eco-friendly decor.

DecorativeTree.name: Decorative Tree
DecorativeTree.description: A very nice touch. It almost looks like a Christmas tree, but it's in season all year around. Passengers often appreciate these kinds of things.

DessertKiosk.name: Dessert Kiosk
DessertKiosk.description: Hire Retail Workers here to sell Donuts. Requires an assigned kitchen to make them!

Door.name: Door
Door.description: Doors can be placed on top of a wall & used to separate different adjoining rooms or areas of your airport. Passengers & Staff can both use this door.

DrinkMachine.name: Drink Machine
DrinkMachine.description: Build in cafes for passengers to use and pay at the cafe's cash register. Thirsty passengers like soft drinks.

Dumpster.name: Dumpster
Dumpster.description: Helps keep trash under control by increasing the capacity of your Garbage Zone.

ElectronicsVending.name: Electronics Vending
ElectronicsVending.description: Makes passengers happy while earning you $5 per transaction.

FancyChairA.name: Fancy Chair A
FancyChairA.description: Gives passengers a place to sit & eat.

FancyChairB.name: Fancy Chair B
FancyChairB.description: Gives passengers a place to sit & eat.

FancyChairC.name: Fancy Chair C
FancyChairC.description: Gives passengers a place to sit & eat.

FancyChairD.name: Fancy Chair D
FancyChairD.description: Gives passengers a place to sit & eat.

FancyChairE.name: Fancy Chair E
FancyChairE.description: Gives passengers a place to sit & eat.

FlightInfoDisplay.name: Flight Info Display
FlightInfoDisplay.description: Passengers use these displays to find out information about their flight including any delays, cancellations, or gate changes.

FlightInfoDisplayXL.name: Flight Info Display XL
FlightInfoDisplayXL.description: A larger flight information display unit with improved area of effect.

FlightInfoServer.name: Flight Info Server
FlightInfoServer.description: Provides the computing backend that powers all Flight Info Displays in your airport.

FoodVending.name: Food Vending
FoodVending.description: Helps to satisfy hungry passengers while also earning you $5 per transaction.

FountainDisplay.name: Fountain Display
FountainDisplay.description: A beautiful and artistic water display that will improve the appearance and environment of your airport.

FountainDisplayB.name: Fountain Display B
FountainDisplayB.description: An elegant water fountain that improves the ambience of your airport.

GarbageBin.name: Garbage Bin
GarbageBin.description: Passengers will (sometimes) put their trash in here. Janitors will empty full trash cans regularly. Place these liberally, no one likes a dirty airport.

GateAgentDesk.name: Gate Agent Desk
GateAgentDesk.description: Used by Passengers & Staff to coordinate the boarding & deboarding of aircraft in your airport. Each Aircraft Gate requires one.

HealthFoodKiosk.name: Health Food Kiosk
HealthFoodKiosk.description: Hire Retail Workers here to sell Avocado On Toast. Requires an assigned kitchen to make them!

HolidayTree.name: Holiday Tree
HolidayTree.description: A very nice touch. It almost looks like a Christmas tree, but it's in season all year around. Passengers often appreciate these kinds of things.

IDCheckStand.name: ID Check Stand
IDCheckStand.description: Placed in the Security Zone, this is the first step of the Security process for your passengers.

KitchenSink.name: Kitchen Sink
KitchenSink.description: Used to support a sanitary, fully-operational kitchen.

KitchenStorage.name: Kitchen Storage
KitchenStorage.description: Adds Crisps and Avocado On Toast to kitchen capabilities.

LargeHangar.name: Large Hangar
LargeHangar.description: A large hangar with up to 5 vehicle spots.

LargeSlidingDoor.name: Large Sliding Door
LargeSlidingDoor.description: A commercial-grade automatic sliding glass door. Large enough to allow several people through at once.

LRTPlatform.name: LRT Platform
LRTPlatform.description: Enables light rail service to your airport, providing a destination hub for metro trains.

MediumHangar.name: Medium Hangar
MediumHangar.description: A medium hangar with up to 3 vehicle spots.

MetalDetector.name: Metal Detector
MetalDetector.description: The mainstay of airport security worldwide, the metal detector allows you to quickly & efficiently check pasengers for security threats & contraband.

NewsStand.name: News Stand
NewsStand.description: Helps keep passengers entertained while earning you $5 per transaction in the process. Requires a scheduled retail worker.

OfficeChair.name: Office Chair
OfficeChair.description: Executives require offices to work and do research -- they also require a place to sit.

OfficeDesk.name: Office Desk
OfficeDesk.description: A good desk is critical & this one will allow your Execs to be able to accomplish their research.

OutdoorGate.name: Outdoor Gate
OutdoorGate.description: A "door" but for the fences on the exterior of your airport. Can be placed on top of roads. Also preserves secure area division.

PAAmplifier.name: PA Amplifier
PAAmplifier.description: Public Address Systems provide announcements, boarding calls, and last-minute information. Helps prevent missed flights, though too many announcements may annoy passengers a bit too!

PAAmplifierHD.name: PA Amplifier HD
PAAmplifierHD.description: Public Address Systems provide announcements, boarding calls, and last-minute information. Helps prevent missed flights, though too many announcements may annoy passengers a bit too! This HD version allows for more speakers & gates, and has slightly better sound quality.

PASpeaker.name: PA Speaker
PASpeaker.description: Public Address Systems provide announcements, boarding calls, and last-minute information. Helps prevent missed flights, though may annoy pax a bit too! Broadcasts a 'cone' of sound.

PASpeaker2-Way.name: PA Speaker 2-Way
PASpeaker2-Way.description: Public Address Systems provide announcements, boarding calls, and last-minute information. Helps prevent missed flights, though may annoy pax a bit too! This is a bi-directional speaker that broadcasts two "cones of sound" in opposite directions.

PhoneChargerStation.name: Phone Charger Station
PhoneChargerStation.description:
Pax phones left with only 5% after the latest software update? This is what they need!
Helps passengers avoid boredom and frustration, but is also costly to run & to maintain.

PizzaJoint.name: Pizza Joint
PizzaJoint.description: New York Style pizza, yum! Hire Retail Workers to serve customers. Requires an assigned kitchen to cook orders!

PizzaOven.name: Pizza Oven
PizzaOven.description: Prepares Pizza and expands your kitchen's food capabilities.

Plant1.name: Plant 1
Plant1.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

Plant2.name: Plant 2
Plant2.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

Plant3.name: Plant 3
Plant3.description: A beautiful decorative plant. Some passengers may appreciate the attention to detail and it may improve their experience at your airport.

PrepCart.name: Prep Cart
PrepCart.description: Chefs use this as a workspace to prepare & fulfill food orders. Has enough space to fulfill 1 order at a time, so build plenty!

HotPlate.name: Hot Plate
HotPlate.description: These must be placed in your kitchen to allow hot food to be stored while it waits to be delivered.

Refrigerator.name: Refrigerator
Refrigerator.description: Adds Pizza, Sushi, and Donuts to kitchen capabilities.

RemoteBagScanner.name: Remote Bag Scanner
RemoteBagScanner.description: This advanced X-Ray machine is also used by your Security staff to scan passenger carry-ons for contraband and other security threats, but this one requires a Remote Security Station to be used.

RemoteSecurityStation.name: Remote Security Station
RemoteSecurityStation.description: Used to monitor the results of one or more assigned Remote Bag Scanner devices.

SecurityExit.name: Security Exit
SecurityExit.description: A secure-area boundary, this allows passengers to transition to non-secure areas.

Sink.name: Sink
Sink.description: Passengers use the sink to rinse their hands or cleanse their face any time they're feeling a bit dirty.

SlidingDoor.name: Sliding Door
SlidingDoor.description: A small commercial-grade yet cost-effective automatic sliding glass door. Not too big, not too small.

SmallHangar.name: Small Hangar
SmallHangar.description: A small hangar with just 1 vehicle spot.

SnackKiosk.name: Snack Kiosk
SnackKiosk.description: Hire Retail Workers here to sell Crisps. Requires an assigned kitchen to box and send them!

StaffDoor.name: Staff Door
StaffDoor.description: Doors can be placed on top of a wall & used to separate different adjoining rooms or areas of your airport. Only your airport Staff can use this door!

StorageShelf.name: Storage Shelf
StorageShelf.description: Helps with supply management by increasing the capacity of your Supplies Zone.

SushiKiosk.name: Sushi Kiosk
SushiKiosk.description: Hire Retail Workers here to sell Sushi. Requires an assigned kitchen to make them!

TicketingDesk.name: Ticketing Desk
TicketingDesk.description: Passengers come here to get their Boarding Pass & to check their baggage. Your Staff will work at these desk to assist the passengers with the check-in process.

TicketingKiosk.name: Ticketing Kiosk
TicketingKiosk.description: Passengers that don't have checked luggage are able to use the automated Ticketing Kiosk to print their boarding pass without needing assistance from a Staff member.

ToiletStall.name: Toilet Stall
ToiletStall.description: Satisfies male & female passengers' bladder needs.

Tree1.name: Tree1
Tree1.description: A very nice and fairly strong tree. Provides an improved aesthetic that your passengers may or may not appreciate.

Tree2.name: Tree2
Tree2.description: Strong and mighty, this is a very nice tree and adds a great aesthetic punch to any airport.

Tree3.name: Tree3
Tree3.description: A classier tree for a classy airport, this tree is visually quite appealing.

BaggageDepot.name: Baggage Depot
BaggageDepot.description: An outdoor endpoint used by tarmac staff that connects to underground conveyor systems.
BaggageDepot.k1: {0} endpoint is outbound only (to hubs with attached carousels)
BaggageDepot.k2: {0} endpoint is inbound only (from hubs with attached ticketing desks)
BaggageDepot.k3: Destination only. Baggage does not pass from pink to blue side.

BaggageHub.name: Baggage Hub
BaggageHub.description: Sorts and routes incoming baggage downstream to other endpoints, including other hubs. 4 ports.

BaggageHub-Specialty6-2.name: Baggage Hub - Specialty 6-2
BaggageHub-Specialty6-2.description: Sorts and routes incoming baggage downstream to other endpoints, including other hubs. 8 ports.

BaggageHubLarge.name: Baggage Hub Large
BaggageHubLarge.description: Sorts and routes incoming baggage downstream to other endpoints, including other hubs. 8 ports.

FuelDepot.name: Fuel Depot
FuelDepot.description: Receives jet fuel deliveries and distributes it to pipeline-connected reservoirs.

FuelingStation.name: Refuel Station
FuelingStation.description: Provide your Fuel Trucks with access to the fuel in your networked storage tanks. Allows refueling services to be offered by your airport.

FuelTank.name: Fuel Tank
FuelTank.description: An outdoor jet fuel storage reservoir with a capacity of 344,000 liters. Used to support refueling operations.

LargeFuelTank.name: Large Fuel Tank
LargeFuelTank.description: A large outdoor jet fuel storage reservoir with a capacity of 1,000,000 liters. Used to support refueling operations.

StairsUp.name: Stairway Up
StairsUp.description: A stairway that, when placed on the current floor, allows your passengers to travel to and from the floor above.

StairsDown.name: Stairway Down
StairsDown.description: A stairway that, when placed on the current floor, allows your passengers to travel to and from the floor below.

EscalatorUp.name: Escalator Up
EscalatorUp.description: An electronic escalator that allows your passengers to travel from the floor it is placed on to the floor directly above. Only allows travel in one direction.

EscalatorDown.name: Escalator Down
EscalatorDown.description: An electronic escalator that allows your passengers to travel from the floor it is placed on to the floor directly below. Only allows travel in one direction.

ConveyorDown.name: Conveyor Down Transition
ConveyorDown.description: Conveyor network object which allows a conveyor segment to transition from the floor this is placed on, to the floor located directly below. Allows for strategic uses of space when designing baggage conveyor networks.

ConveyorUp.name: Conveyor Up Transition
ConveyorUp.description: Conveyor network object which allows a conveyor segment to transition from the floor it's placed on to the floor located directly below. Allows for strategic uses of space when designing baggage conveyor networks.

SmallGateStairs.name: Small Gate Stairs
SmallGateStairs.description: Adds stairs to your Small Aircraft Gate, and makes it accessible exclusively from the second floor.

MovingWalkway.name: Moving Walkway
MovingWalkway.description: Gives passengers a faster way to travel long distances.

ArcadeDriver.name: Arcade Driver Game
ArcadeDriver.description: Let your have some fun as they take corners fast and pay you for the privilege!

ArcadeRetro.name: Arcade Retro Game
ArcadeRetro.description: A blast from the past! Pax need to keep away from the ghostly monsters, until they start blinking! A good time for all involved.

ArcadeBlaster.name: Arcade Blaster Game
ArcadeBlaster.description: Aliens are no match for your bored pax - frustration will be relieved in no time with this one.

ArcadePinball.name: Arcade Pinball Game
ArcadePinball.description: Pax will be nostalgic over this gem!

DigitalAdDisplay.name: Digital Ad Display
DigitalAdDisplay.description: Though maybe annoying to the pax (negative environment impact), it will bring in some extra revenue. How much depends on how much foot traffic is nearby!

DrinkVending.name: Drink Vending
DrinkVending.description: Passengers get thirsty and this is one solution to the problem. Plus, a little extra revenue never hurts (make sure to set the price accordingly)!

FlightInfoKiosk.name: Flight Info Kiosk
FlightInfoKiosk.description: Passengers often need help finding where they're going so that they can make their flight on time, and these machines are the absolute gold standard. The bell might not save them, but it's all right - with this kiosk they'll be at the corner just in time!

RoadRampUp.name: Road Ramp Up
RoadRampUp.description: Allows roads to transition up a single level.

RoadRampDown.name: Road Ramp Down
RoadRampDown.description: Allows roads to transition down a single level.

UndergroundFuelTank.name: Underground Fuel Tank
UndergroundFuelTank.description: Underground fuel storage tank in an extra large form factor. Takes up all of floors -1 and -2 wherever it is placed and requires nothing above it during construction.

Objects.displaydescription: Display {0} for your passengers to buy in Store zones! Can hold {1} at a time.

BookDisplayA.name: Book Display A
BookDisplayA.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

BookDisplayB.name: Book Display B
BookDisplayB.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

CandyDisplayA.name: Candy Display A
CandyDisplayA.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

CandyDisplayB.name: Candy Display B
CandyDisplayB.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

MakeupDisplayA.name: Makeup Display A
MakeupDisplayA.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

MakeupDisplayB.name: Makeup Display B
MakeupDisplayB.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

SouvenirDisplayA.name: Souvenir Display A
SouvenirDisplayA.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

SouvenirDisplayB.name: Souvenir Display B
SouvenirDisplayB.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

SouvenirDisplayC.name: Souvenir Display C
SouvenirDisplayC.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

ClothesDisplay.name: Clothes Display
ClothesDisplay.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

ShoeDisplayA.name: Shoe Display A
ShoeDisplayA.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

ShoeDisplayB.name: Shoe Display B
ShoeDisplayB.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

PharmacyDisplayA.name: Pharmacy Display A
PharmacyDisplayA.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

PharmacyDisplayB.name: Pharmacy Display B
PharmacyDisplayB.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

PharmacyDisplayC.name: Pharmacy Display C
PharmacyDisplayC.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

JewelryDisplayA.name: Jewelry Display A
JewelryDisplayA.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

JewelryDisplayB.name: Jewelry Display B
JewelryDisplayB.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY

JewelryDisplayC.name: Jewelry Display C
JewelryDisplayC.description: Display Reuse Description DO NOT MODIFY
